values.SYSTEM_EXIT_DIALOG_MESSAGE: Do you wish to exit the game?
values.SYSTEM_FULLSCREEN_DIALOG_MESSAGE: Do you wish to make the window full screen?
values.いまご飯を持ってくるわね: I'll bring you something to eat.
values.でもお名前もわからないんでしょう？: But you don't know their names?
values.ほら言えないでしょう: See, you don't know, do you?
values.お友達に会いに行くわ！: I'm going to find my friends!
values.またへんなとこへ来ちゃったわ: I'm here again to this weird place.
values.蓮子ともはぐれたし: And I lost sight of Renko.
values.たすけたらともだちだもん: If I help him he will be my friend.
values.竹林で迷って困ってたの: I got lost in the bamboo forest.
values.へんな薬で頭が痛いし: My head hurts because of that weird medicine.
values.ラベルを見ようとしたら液が漏れてね: I was trying to read the label and it spilled!
values.これがなにか知ってるの？: Do you know what it is?
values.ええ、見えちゃいけないものまで見えそう: I can see things I shouldn't!
values.一緒に探してくれる？: Can we look for them together?
values.これに音を録音して再生できるのよ: You can record sounds on this and play it back.
values.こないだ落としたのね: I lost it the other day.
values.この中に音をためておいて、あとから聞けるのよ: Store the sounds and can listen to them later.
values.レコードは知ってるのね: You know what a record is.
values.レコードにも蓄音機がいるでしょ？: A record needs a phonograph, right?
values.これは蓄音機。円盤がいるの: This is a phonograph. It needs a disc.
values.あなたにはどんな友達がいるの？: What kind of friends do you have?
values.うーんいないわねえ: I don't think she is here.
values.この辺にいるような気はするんだけどなあ: Seems like she would be around here though...
values.携帯もないしなあ: She doesn't even have a phone.
values.カセットテープを流す機械: The machine that reads cassette tapes.
values.しばらく貸してあげるわ: I'll lend it to you for now.
values.このまま進んじゃうと\nもっとはぐれちゃいそう: If we keep going we're going to lose her for sure.
values.こっちのセリフよ: That's what I was going to say!
values.手分けして探そうなんて言って: You said to split up and search for it!
values.ぱーっと走っていくのがいけないんじゃない: You can't just go running off!
values.てっきり現実に戻れると思っていたのに: I thought I could return to reality.
values.鴨川の屋台ラーメンかと思ったのに: I thought it was a river ramen stand...
values.ねえ、お友達いっぱいいるの: I have a lot of friends!
values.竹林から出たいなら道案内してやるから待ってろ: If you wanna leave this forest, wait and I'll take you out.
values.診療所に行きたいのか？: You wanna go to a clinic?
values.あっちに邪魔なのがいるの: There's something in the way over there.
values.でもあっちへ行っても何もないぞ: But there isn't anything over there.
values.でも友達が行きたいって言ってるの: My friend says she wants to go!
values.自分の中にたくさん何かがあるやつだ: Someone with a lot of something within them.
values.でも見たところ、お前空っぽだろー？: But as you see, you're empty.
values.どこかこの辺りにテープを落としたの: I dropped a tape somewhere around here.
values.音の入っていないテープよ: It's a tape with no sound on it.
values.もし見つけたら拾っておいて: If you find one, pick it up!
values.好きにさせてあげましょ: Let's let her do what she likes.
values.やっぱり聞かない名前ね: That's not a name you hear often.
values.ここから出たいの？: Would you like to get out of here?
values.あなた私より余程妖怪らしいわよ: You seem much more a ghost than me!
values.薬を作っているお医者先生はまた別: The doctor who makes the medicine is different.
values.人間用の薬がほとんどだけどね: Most of my medicines are for humans though.
values.私はこの先の「虚無」に\n人が迷い込まぬよう見守っています:
I'm here to keep people from getting lost
in the "Nothingness" up ahead.
values.知恵持たずして生きるは\n磁針無くして海漕ぎ出づるに同じ:
Living without wisdom is akin to sailing the
ocean without a compass.
values.とりあえずあたりを調べなきゃね: For now I better see what's going on around here.
values.喋り続けないと静けさで狂いそうだわ:
If I don't keep talking the silence
will drive me crazy!
values.この人たちはもう間に合わない: These people will not make it.
values.診療所に来る人間を待ち伏せしてさ: Waiting in ambush for people who come to the clinic
values.ガッチリ稼ぐつもりだったのに: I was going to make a lot of money.
values.私は別に死んだ人間には興味ないし: I have no concern with the Dead.
values.気になるなら調べてみたら？:
You may pursue this matter by
yourself.
values.自殺ならあるかもね: In case of a suicide there often is.
values.私はできなかったから知らない: I would not know such things.
values.機械を返してちょうだい: Please give me back the machine.
values.こいしちゃんが話したことがこの中に入るのよ: What you say here will go inside.
values.あなたにもここを見てもらいたくて: I want you to check this.
values.私にはあなたの声しか聞こえないわ: I can hear only your voice.
values.割れたのは瓶よ: The only thing that split was the bottle.
values.病院に行きたい: I want to go to the hospital.
values.じゃああなたもあの薬を浴びてから\nあの子が見えたの？: So you took that medicine and could see?
values.あの薬で幻覚を見ているとしたら？:
Is that medicine giving you
hallucinations?
values.でも私にもメリーにも\n同じ姿が見えているのよ: But I am seeing the same things as you Mary.
values.幻覚なら違うものが見えるはずよ:
We couldn't both have the same
hallucination.
values.例えばブーバキキ効果のように\n文化圏や経験によらない――:
Just like the bouba/kiki effect.
Culture and experience doesn't matter.
values.人類が普遍的に持つイメージが彼女なのかも:
She could be a universal image
to all of humanity.
values.彼女はやっぱり本当に\nいるのかしら: Perhaps she is real after all.
values.いままでもずっと彼女は存在していて、: She's been real this whole time...
values.あの薬をきっかけに認知できるように――: and that medicine is a trigger for sensing her...
values.いや、どういう理屈なんだ: What kind of sense does that make?
values.ブーバキキ少女説のほうが\n説得力あるわ: The bouba/kiki girl theory is more believable.
values.この現象、唯名論的な\n所以なのかしら: Could this phenomenon be a nominalist reason?
values.小石って名前だから認知の外側に\n追いやられたっていうの？:
"Little stone" could have been pushed
outside recognition?
values.誰にも気づかれないから小石\nだなんて名前を付けたっていうの？: They named her that so she would go unnoticed?
values.そんな母親がいるっていうの？: What kind of mother would do that?
values.この百年間、嫌な時代よ: These 100 years have not been a good time.
values.昔は人って生まれた時から死ぬ時\nまで同じ生活をしていられたのよ:
It used to be that people's lifestyles
were the same from cradle to grave.
values.時代が止まればいいのに: If only we could stop time.
values.それじゃあ彼女はやっぱり本当にいるのかしら: Perhaps she is real after all.
values.例えばこの風邪薬は一粒飲むと風邪が治る:
For example, this medicine cures
your cold with one drop.
values.それに効き目は人次第: It also depends on the person.
values.眠れる薬とかないの: Do you have anything to help me sleep?
values.あなたも私も生きている: You and I are also living.
values.試供品をあげましょ: Let me give you a sample.
values.死、つまり虚無を体験した気分は？:
Death, in other words, nothingness.
How did it feel?
values.死は残酷な旅の始まりなの: Death is the start of a cruel journey.
values.認知の外側について考えるのは人に任せるわ:
I'll let others think about what lies
outside preception.
values.理解に苦しむわ、哲学を語るくせに\nこいつカントを読んでないのよ:
I don't get it, you talk philosophy but
haven't read Kant!
values.でも地蔵はほら、いるのよ: But the Jizo is right here!
values.この地蔵が通してくれないのよ: This Jizo won't let us pass.
values.貴方を待ってるみたいよ: It seems to be waiting for you.
values.私だってこんなことしないわ: I'm not going to do this.
values.なにも起きなければいいんだけれど: As long as nothing bad happened...
values.おうちにかえしてあげる！: I'm going to send you home.
values.確かにこの辺りは怪しいわ: Certainly this is a bit strange.
values.境界線が見つかりそう: Like we could find the boundary...
values.でもメビウス環的パラドックスの気配もするわ:
This seems like a Möbius loop
paradox.
values.何を探せばいいんだっけ: What was it I need to find?
values.私はそれを見ればそれとわかる: If I see it I'll know it.
values.来た時もそこを通じて来たからこのあたりよ:
We passed this area when we came
 so it must be around here!
values.蓮子は今自分がどこにいるかわかるのよ: Renko knows where she is now.
values.私が二人をお家に返してあげる！: I will send you two back home.
values.雪だるまだって名人よ！: I'm also famous for making snowmen!
values.あのね、あなた”自分の足で歩く”のよ: You have to "walk on your own feet".
values.それに掘ったら土の色が変わるの: If we dig here, the color changes.
values.でもこれはちっちゃすぎて通れないから\n私は私のを探すわ:
This one is too small to go through.
I'll look for my own.
values.ここだわ。空間の重なりの境界線があるわ:
Right here, the boundary of these
overlapping space.
values.私が見つけたのより大きいのに見えないの: This one is larger but you can't see it...
values.大きい力ほど目には見えないものなのよ:
There are things of great power that
can't be seen.
values.あなたどうしてここがわかったの？: How do did you know it's here?
values.やらなくちゃいけないことがあるから: I have something I have to do.
values.ずーっとずーっと長生きしたら: If you can live a long time...
values.この辺りはメビウス環がねじれているわ: A Möbius loop is twisting around around here.
values.わからなかったらカンでもいいのよ: If you can't find it, you can guess.
values.目的地はここから東の方角みたいね: From here it seems to be in the east.
values.境界は南の方角よ！: The boundary is to the south!
values.言っとくがあっちには本当に何もないぞ:
I'm telling you but there is really
nothing over there.
values.メリーは東洋哲学を\nなにかはき違えているみたいね: Mary seems to have switched to Eastern philosophy.
values.なんにせよこのちんちくりんの\n化け物は本当にヤバいぞ:
Anyway, this little monster is really
terrible.
values.お前には見えてないみたいだけどな:
It doesn't seem like you can
see it though.
values.あの娘を助けるならお前も\n空っぽの器に手を突っ込むんだ:
If you wanna help that girl, you gotta
put your hand in an empty container.
values.悪いけどもう少し付き合ってちょうだい: Please, stay with me just a bit longer.
values.私はここに長居なんて御免だわ: I don't want to hang around here.
values.無意識に感情の残滓が膨張しそう:
Without knowing it, emotional fragment
 are growing...
values.気づかないうちに心が崩れて死ぬ:
Your heart could break and kill you
if you're not careful.
values.自分の心の声が大きく聞こえるわ: I can hear my inner voice so clearly.
values.助けたんだから友達よね: I helped so he is my friend.
values.先へ行きたいんだけど: I want to go up ahead.
values.お手紙とかないかな:
Maybe there's a letter around
here...
values.こないだ遊んだ子は一緒に雪だるまつくったの: We made snowmen together the other day.
values.でもわたしほんとうは友達いないの: I don't really have any friends.
values.生きてても死んでても同じよ: Life and death are the same.
values.お絵かき見せてあげるから: I'll show you how to draw.
values.こんどはうまくいきますように: I hope this time works out.
values.遊びたいけれど今はダメだわ: I wanna play but not now!
values.いま友達呼ぶから！: I'm going to call my friend now!
values.はさみでなにをしたらいいのかしら: What do I do with these scissors?
values.自分で考えなきゃダメ？:
Do I have to think of
it myself?
values.なにやってるんだろう: I wonder what they are doing...
values.でも頑張んなきゃ: But I have to work at it!
values.うちでもやりたいな: I want to make one at home.
values.あけたくない: I don't want to open it.
values.みんなは遊んでるのにずるい！:
Not fair, everyone else is
having a good time.
values.なんでわたしだけお留守番なの？: Why should only I stay in?
values.檻の鍵はご主人様が持ってるの: My master has the key to the cage.
values.ご主人様の部屋は奥のほう: My master's room is over there...
values.まずあの子を助けなきゃ: I gotta help that bird first.
values.あの部屋へ行かなきゃ: I need to get to that room.
values.ご主人様に御用ですか？:
What business do you have
with the master?
values.あいにくお出かけされていますが: I'm afraid he is out of the house.
values.ねえ鍵知ってる？: Hmm, have you seen a key...?
values.屋敷の鍵はみんなご主人様が\n持っているはずですケド:
Every master has a key to their
mansion, right
values.おこってないのにそんな顔なんですか: Then why are you making that face?
values.名前通りのコロコロしたやつだぜ: Just like your name, rolling around!
values.だめなんだぞだめなんだぞ:
You can't do that.
You can't do that.
values.さとり様がダメって言ってたのに: Satori said you can't do that!
values.こまったわ: I don't know what to do.
values.上に行かなきゃいけないのよー: I have to get up there.
values.さっき何渡してたの: What did you just hand over?
values.強い生き物は鳴かないのよ:
Strong animals don't need to
make noise.
values.私みたいに女の武器を持てば――:
If you had a woman's weapon
like me
values.だめって言ってたから: I was told that I can't...
values.言っちゃダメって言われてるの: I'm not supposed to say anything.
values.だから気にしなくてもいいんだよ: So you don't have to worry.
values.いい子だから教えて？: Don't worry, you can tell me.
values.これで友達を助けられるわ: I can help my friend now!
values.この目玉誰から引っこ抜いたんだろうなあ:
This eye was taken from
someone...
values.目が三つ以上あればいいけど: If you had over three eyes...
values.なんで死んだと思うのかしら: Why do you think she died?
values.みんなをいじめたけどまだ大丈夫ってこと？:
It's going to be OK
even though I bullied everyone?
values.わたしもボールであそぶの！:
I want to play with the
ball, too!
values.わたしも友達とお出かけするのお！: I'm going out with my friends, too!
"We" have to practice before
we go out.
values.わたしが遊びに来てあげるから: I'll come here to play with you.
values.あとはキラキラおめめがほしいな！: Now I just need a shiny eye!
values.あとは鍵ね: Now all I need is that key.
values.ここおっきな蜘蛛がいるのよ！: There's a big spider in here.
values.メリーと蓮子大丈夫かな: I wonder if Mary and Renko are ok.
values.ちょっとなつかしい: Brings me back memories a bit
values.ちょっとかしてね: Lemme have it for a bit.
values.さっき渡したのね: You passed off the key earlier
values.あんなに大きいのに片方はまだ喋らないぞ: She's this old and she can barely speak!
values.育て方が正しいのなら生まれが悪いんだろう: If it's not your parenting, it's the birth.
values.本当に禁酒できていたんだろうな: Did you really give up drinking?
values.ずっと留守にして家の様子なんて\nご存じないでしょう:
You are out all the time
and don't know anything.
values.うちの家は全員秀才揃いなんだ: My family is full of talent
values.私は３歳で福音書を暗唱できたのに: I was reciting the gospel at age 3!
values.社交辞令だよバカ:
That's just an empty compliment
You idiot!
values.だが母親失格だ: But you've failed as a mother!
values.だってあたし、双子が生まれるだなんて: But I didn't expect to have the twins...
values.それから、田舎臭い言葉も控えなさい: From now on, stop using your bumpkin language!
values.来月、弟が訪ねてくる: My brother is visiting next month.
values.男を産めないならせめて\nまともな娘を育ててくれ:
If you can't give me a son at
least raise a decent daughter!
values.それができないなら\n話せないやつは顔を出させるな: If you can't do that, keep her out of sight!
values.あ゛あ゛あ゛あ゛あ゛あ゛あ゛あ゛あ゛: Waa Waa Waa Waa Waa Waa Waa Waa Waa
values.そんな目で見ないで！: Don't look at me like that!
values.こんなのさわってるばあいじゃない！: This isn't the time to play around!
values.満点だってお前には不満だろう:
Being perfect, you must
be dissatisfied.
values.それにひきかえ\nこいつは母親に似てしまったな:
In return this one ended up just
like your mother.
values.こいつは閉じ込めておくんだ: This one will be put away.
values.入院中だと言えばいい: We can say she's in the hospital.
values.さとりにはおめかしさせてから連れて来るんだ: Bring Satori after dressing her up.
values.あ˝あ˝あ˝あ˝あ˝あ˝あ˝あ˝あ˝あ˝あ˝あ˝: Waa Waa Waa Waa Waa Waa Waa Waa Waa
values.ここまで旅してきてどうだった？:
How has it been to come
this far?
values.人生はチョコレートの箱: Life is like a box of chocolates.
values.開けなければわからない:
If you don't open it, you have
no idea.
values.君は早く”目を開けて”中身を見ないとね:
You have to "open your eyes"
and look inside.
values.あなたが眠っている間にいろんなことがあったわ:
A lot happened while you were
sleeping.
values.山のほうからお客さんが来たり: Cuscomers have come from the mountains
values.街道のほうもにぎやかになったりね: The streets are full of people.
values.いいお話を持ってきてくれるんだけど: They bring us a sweet deal but...
values.お断りしなくちゃ: I have to turn it down.
values.わたしの気持ちが伝わってうれしいわ:
I'm glad you understand
how I feel.
values.あきらめなくてよかったわ: I'm glad I didn't give up.
values.わたしはやりたいようにやるわ！: I'm going to do what I want!
values.第三者の目とは関係なくなる: I can be free from the "Third Eye".
values.もうなにも考えなくていいんだわ！:
I won't have to worry
about anything now!
values.誰のお墓かしら: I wonder whose grave it is?
values.あっちにもう一人友達いるの: I already have a friend there.
values.たぶんあの子も同じ: Maybe that kid is the same.
values.いっしょにすごいのを作ってほしいの: I wanna make a great one together!
values.すごいので見返したいでしょ: You wanna get back at them right?
values.あんまり触りたくない: I don't want to touch it!
values.シャベルもらってよかった: Good thing I got a shovel.
values.ゆきんこだからへいきなの！: I'm a Snow Child so I'm fine!
values.ゆきんこだから\nゆきだるまも一番になるから！:
I'm a Snow Child and gonna be
the best snowman!
values.責任についてどう思っているんだ: What do you think about responsibility?
values.約束や責任を何だと思っているんだ！:
What do you think about responsibility
and promises?
values.あらお嬢様のご友人様かしら: Could that be that lady's friend?
values.彼女と貴方はとても似ているわ: She and you look so similar.
values.きっと彼女と貴方で\n”いい仕事”ができるわよ: She and you can do a "good job."
values.じゃあこれ貸してあげる: Alright, I'll lend this to you!
values.毎年雪が積もったら木をきれいにするの:
Every year the snow falls
and we decorate the trees.
values.いっぱい雪が降ったら\nやることなくなっちゃうからね！:
When the snow falls,
we have nothing to do!
values.なんでこの子を連れてきたの: Why did you bring her here?
values.自分で作ったものは壊していいし: Knocking down your own is fine!
values.わたしはこの子と作るから！: I'm gonna make one with her!
values.ねえ、私とやりたくなったらすぐおいでね:
If you want to do it with me,
come by anytime!
values.じゃあ丘の上でね: Maybe on the top of that hill.
values.雪いっぱいあるし: There's alot of s now up there!
values.私だって世界一の達人なのよ: I'm the best in the world!
values.雪玉を作るときはね\nすこしずつゆっくり転がすの:
When you make a snowball,
be sure to slowly roll it.
values.まっすぐじゃなくていろんな向きにね: Not just straight but all around.
I'm a genius but the ways...
values.やりかたを知らないだけだから: Just because you don't know the way
values.あなたたちは材料をもってきてちょうだい！: You can all gather the materials!
values.それじゃあやっちゃおう！: In that case, let's finish it!
values.まだ頭がないじゃないの！: We still don't have a head!
values.これじゃ世界一なんていえない！: Can't be the best without a head!
values.ずるいずるいずるいずるい: No fair! No fair! No fair!
values.なんでこの子はいいの！: What's so good about this kid?
values.あのね、おねえちゃんが\n教えてくれたから上手にできたの！: My sister taught me how to get this done!
values.おめめをどうしたらいいかわからないの: I dunno how to do the eyes!
values.きょうも手伝ってくれないの？: Can you help me again today?
values.もう達人だから、\nおねえちゃん教えてくれないんだって:
She won't teach me anymore
'cuz I'm already a master!
values.もうおねえちゃんと遊べないの？: I can't play with sister anymore?
values.じゃあべつに達人なんてならなくても\nよかったのに:
I didn't wanna be a master
if you don't play with me!
values.ご本を読んで作ったのよ！: I read it in a book!
values.はじめてなのに上手にできた！: Even though it's my first time!
values.そうね、あなたは何でも上手ね: Of course, you're good at everything.
values.シャベル持ってきてよかった: Good thing I brought a shovel.
values.誰のせいでこうなったと思う？: Whose fault do you think this is?
values.こうなるってわからなかったの？: What did you think would happen?
values.でもせかいいちなのよ！\nせかいいち、作れるの？:
It's gotta be the best!
Can we make the best?
values.あしおれたらのってもいい？: Can I ride it if I break my leg?
values.このはっぱ、えがかけるよ: I could draw with these leaves.
values.これさわるといろがかわるんだよ！: It's a different color when I touch it!
values.おつきさまとれるかな: Can I reach the moon with this?
values.今度はもっと計画的にやろう: Next time I'll be more organized.
values.お仕事しなきゃなあ: I've gotta do my job, huh?
Nobody's gonna yell at me anyway.
I can always do it later...
values.い、いつからそこに:
H-How long have you
been there?!
values.いまやるから、もうちょっとまっててくれよ:
I'm doing it.
Just be patient, okay?
values.みせものじゃないんだ、いきな！: Go away and stop watching me!
values.おまえひまなのか？: Don't you got anything better to do?
values.おまえやることないのか？: I'm asking if you're doing anything.
values.でも、わたしなにをしなきゃいけないんだっけ: But what did I have to do again...?
values.泣いてる子だあれ？\n泣いてる子は迎えに行くよ:
Aww, is somebody crying?
I'll make it better!
values.らりるれろ！らりるれろ！らりるれろ！: La li lu le lo! La li lu le lo!
values.すべてをやり直せます: We can do it all over.
values.心的外傷を癒す時が来たのです: It's time to cure her trauma.
values.おかけになった電話番号は\n現在使われておりません:
The number you have dialed
is not in service.
values.明日の天気はハレ、明日の天気はハレ:
Tomorrow will be sunny.
Tomorrow will be sunny.
values.火事ですか救急ですか？:
Is there a fire
or a medical emergency?
values.申します申します、どちらへお繋しますか？:
Hello there. Who would you like
me to put you through to?
values.熊手は役に立ったかい？: Did the rake come in handy?
values.今度はちゃんとお金をもらってくるんだぞ！:
Next time, make sure
you bring money with you!
But the water tap needs help...
values.わかった、貸すだけだぞ！: Fine, but you're only borrowing it!
values.なんでしらないひとと\nなかよくしなきゃいけないの？:
Why should I play nice
with strangers, anyway?
I wish I could just sell
the stuff I like.
Wish I could be like other girls...
values.これだいすき！なんでわかったの？: I love these! How did you know?
values.売れ残りだけど、あげちゃう！:
It's just leftover stock, but sure,
it's all yours!
values.仮面屋よりも、もっとやりたいことあるんだよね:
There are so many things I'd rather
do than run this mask shop.
values.本当はやってみたいこと、ない？:
Don't you have anything
you'd rather be doing?
values.そうだよな！\nそれじゃあ特におすすめの希望の面！\nこれは5000でいいぞ！:
Of course you do! Well, I recommend
this special Mask of Hope! Only 5,000!
values.当然さぁ、お店なんだから！:
Well, yeah.
I'm running a store, not a charity!
values.お金ないときはどうしたらいいの？: What if I don't have any money?
values.金がないんじゃあ仮面は売れないね！\nとっとといきな！:
If you don't have money then
I'm not selling! Get lost!
values.だいきらいなのに離れたくないもの、なーんだ？:
What's something you hate but
you never want to be far from?
values.私が話しても誰も返事しない:
Even when I talk,
nobody answers me.
values.先生は黙りなさいっていうの。\nしゃべっていいんでしょ？:
Teacher says to be quiet.
It's okay to talk, right?
values.先生いなくてもだまってたんだ: I was just being quiet anyway.
values.まえはおしゃべりしてくれるひと\nたくさんいたのにね！:
It used to be that lots of
people would talk with me.
values.これ飛ぶ奴だよね！:
It's one of those
spinny-flying things!
values.これどこまで飛ぶかなあ: How far do you think it'll fly?
values.わたしあの子のことあんまり知らない: I don't care much about her.
values.あーでもこれ秘密だった: Oh, I'm not s'posed to tell.
values.秘密基地だから……: It's s'posed to be a secret.
values.先生がやりなさいって言ったやつ！: What our teacher told us to do!
values.だから先生がみんなで遊べるからって言ったの:
So the teacher said we
all had to play together!
values.これだったらいいんだって！: She said it'd all work out then!
values.でもみんなこれしかやらないから: But what else can we do?
values.だれもおしゃべりしてくれないから……: And nobody will talk to me...
values.むかしね、みんなあかちゃんだったでしょ！:
You know, everyone used
to be babies in the past!
values.あかちゃんはいいよねー\nしゃべったら\nほめてくれるんだもん！:
Being a baby is great!
They'll praise you just for talking!
values.ねえねえ、空の上には極楽があるって\n先生はいうんだけどさあ！:
Hey, you know how the teacher says
there's a paradise above the sky?
values.お空に飛べたらぶつかっちゃうしね:
If you fly into the sky
you'll bump into it.
values.あなた、どうしておくちがあかないの？: Hey, why doesn't your mouth open?
values.合言葉は仲間にしか教えちゃいけないんだぜ:
You can only get the password
from one of us.
values.中のものが欲しいのか？:
You want something
from in here?
values.そら、あの子の忘れ物だ:
Here, that girl over there
dropped it.
I just wanna be like
everyone else...
I'm not like this 'cuz I wanna be...
values.ひみつきちだって\n私だけは入れない……:
They won't let me
in their secret base...
values.用がないならあっちいけよ: If you don't want anything, go away.
values.なんだよ！あっちいけよ！: What do you want?! Go away!
values.排水溝が詰まってるのにだめでしょ！:
The drain's clogged,
you can't do that!
values.こわいけどやさしいもの、なーんだ？:
Who's somebody that's
scary but also nice?
values.パパもママも好きって言ったもん:
Mommy and Daddy
said they loved me!
values.迎えに来てくれるもん！: They're coming to pick me up!
values.だっていっつも怒ってるんだモン:
I mean,
she's mad all the time.
values.みんなで遊ぶのはいいけど\nあの子と一緒にいるの嫌なの:
Group play's fine, but I
don't like being around her.
values.友達だけが入れる\n秘密の部屋があるの！:
It's a secret room where
only your friends are allowed!
values.うーん教えようかな\nどうしようかな: Hmm, I dunno if I should tell you...
values.ねえ、なんでそんなこと言うの？:
Hey, why do you say
stuff like that?
values.責任取って雪だるまにして！: Man up and make me a snowman!
values.世界一の雪だるまになるんだから！: The best one in the world!
values.わたしのからだにいっぱい雪をつけるでしょ: Put a lot of snow on me.
values.きらいだけどきなきゃだめ？: I don't like it... Do I have to wear it?
values.雪の中で乗ったらすごいんじゃない？: Would be fun to ride in the snow.
values.まだしまっとこっと: I'll put this away for now.
values.お道具も取りに行ってくださったのね！: You even fetched a tool for me!
values.お姉さんが貸してくれたの！: The lady let me borrow this!
values.あなたはいい子にならなきゃだめよ: You have to be a good girl.
values.この楽しさがわからないなんて:
You don't get what's fun
about this?
values.こんなとこくるんじゃなかったわ: I knew this was a bad idea.
values.私たちいまから縄跳びで遊ぶの: We're about to play jump rope.
values.それより人形遊びのほうが賢いし素敵よ:
Playing with dolls is way
smarter and neato!
values.なわとびなんて汚くなるし人生を無駄にしてる:
Jump rope is dirty and stupid.
You're wasting your life.
values.なんでそんなこと言われなきゃならないの？:
Why you gotta say
stuff like that?
values.バカにしに来たわけ？:
Did you come here
to make fun of us?
values.おめめがよくなるお薬。ちょっとこわい: Medicine for your eyes. A little scary.
values.”人生はチョコレートの箱”: "Life is like a box of chocolates."
values.骨だ！おっきいから足だと思う: A bone! It's big, so a leg bone?
values.これは骨！ジョンにあげようかな: This is a bone! Should I give it to John?
values.おっきい！大人も殺せちゃう: Huge! This would even kill a grown-up!
values.「音楽室の怪談 ～Beethoven Portrait」 \"MusicRoom: "Ghost Story in the Music Room ～Beethoven Portrait" "MusicRoom"
values.「あの子がね、真夜中の音楽室で見たんだって･･･」: "That girl saw the ghost in the music room late at night..."
values.「モナリザの微笑 ～La Gioconda」 東方地霊殿\"ハートフェルトファン: "Mona Lisa's Smile ～La Gioconda" Subterranean Animism "Heartfelt Fancy"
values.「美術室にモナリザの絵があるでしょ、あれってね･･･」: "The Mona Lisa hanging in the art gallery, well that one..."
values.深淵を覗く時、深淵もまたこちらを覗いているのだ。: If you gaze long enough into an abyss, the abyss will gaze back into you.
values.この屋敷は恐ろしいものが彷徨っている: Frightening things wander through this mansion.
values.たのしいたのしい天国のピクニック･･･: A wonderful, joyful picnic in heaven...
values.夜道を一人で歩いてはいけない。何かが後ろにいるのだから。: Don't walk alone at night. Something you do not know is behind you.
values.「sterrennacht」 東方紺珠伝\"見た事も無い悪夢の世界\": "sterrennacht" Legacy of Lunatic Kingdom "A World of Nightmares Never Seen Before"
values.夜道を一人で歩いてはいけない。この不思議は私だけのものだから。: Don't walk alone at night. This wonder is only mine.
values.「Enfantterrible」 東方星蓮船\"幽霊客船の時空を越えた旅\": "Enfantterrible" Undefined Fantastic Object "Interdimensional Voyage of a Ghostly Passenger Ship"
values.賢しいお子さん達にお会いしましたか？: Did you meet the clever boys?
values.それはきっと、てんしさまのおくりもの: This must be a gift from an angel.
values.「鰍沢 ～Kajikazawa」 東方紅魔郷\"おてんば恋娘\": "Kajikazawa ～Kajikazawa" The Embodiment of Scarlet Devil "Tomboyish Girl in Love"
values.南無妙法蓮華経･･･ 南無妙法蓮華経･･･: Glory to the Sutra... Glory to the Sutra...
values.「And Then There Were None」 東方紅魔郷\"U.N.オー: "And Then There Were None" The Embodiment of Scarlet Devil "U.N. Owen Was Her?"
values.私は親不孝ものだ。親をカゴかきにしてしまった。: I am an unfilial child, making my parents haul baskets.
values.この子はきっと呪われているのです。: This child is most certainly cursed.
values.今度の贈り物は色鉛筆がいい: I'd like some colored pencils for a present.
values.日向に行ったのかな: Did he go to a sunny place?
values.お姉ちゃんがネジ巻き忘れたのかな: Did she forget to wind it?
values.レコードも円盤だけじゃなくて\n蓄音機がいるでしょ？:
Records aren't just frisbees.
They need a record player, right?
values.またみっけた！またあった！: I found it again! Here again!
values.診療所に来る人間を待ち伏せして\n薬を売る作戦だったのに:
The plan was to wait for people coming
to the hospital and sell them medicine...
values.あ゛あ゛あ゛あ゛あ゛あ゛あ゛あ゛あ゛あ゛あ゛: Waa Waa Waa Waa Waa Waa Waa Waa Waa
values.あ゛あ゛あ゛あ゛あ゛あ゛\nあ゛あ゛あ゛あ゛あ゛あ゛: Waa Waa Waa Waa Waa Waa Waa Waa Waa
values.からっぽ！おみずはどこ？: It’s empty. Where can I get some water?
values.おみずでいっぱい！何に使おう: It’s full. Where should I pour it?
values.これで高いところのものにとどくよ！: I can reach high places with this!
values.冷たくてみどりいろ！あの子がほしいのこれかな: It’s cold and green. Is this the right one?
values.小さい声の女の子もスターになれる。: A quiet girl can also become a star!
values.大きな音がでる！こんなの誰が使うのかな: Magnifies sound. Who would use this?
values.落ち葉を集めるのに便利な: It’s useful for raking up fallen leaves.
values.竹細工の玩具。よく飛ぶ。: It’s a flying toy made of bamboo.
values.恐怖の権現を模した仮面。: This mask is an avatar of fear.
values.こわい。命令されてるみたい: Like it’s ordering me about… Scary!
values.これは……スコップ！宝物を掘ろう: I can dig up treasure with this shovel!
values.骨だ！材料になりそう！: A bone! This bone can be an ingredient!
values.これは骨！材料にしましょ: Let's use this as an ingredient.
values.きれい！材料になるかな？: Lovely! Will it work as an ingredient?
values.きれい！これはだいじな材料！: Beautiful! This is an important ingredient.
values.斧。オーバールック謹製: This ax was carefully made by Overlook.
values.おっきい！首をはねよ！: It’s big! I could decapitate someone…
values.異教徒の儀式に使われる装飾品。: This decoration is used in Pagan ceremonies.
values.カセットテープを録音・再生できます。: This can play or record cassette tapes.
values.テープを使ったら音が聞けるんだって！: You can listen to tapes with this!
values.置いて行かれそうになっちゃう: Seems like it will be left behind…
values.蓮子ちゃんが好きな音！これを聞けば寄ってくるかな？: Renko loves this! Will she come if she hears this?
values.聞いちゃダメってかいてある！: It says not to listen to it.
values.音がないよ！どうやって使うのかな: It’s blank. How can I use this?
values.この人だれ？このひとすき！: Who is this? I like this person!
values.むかし聞いたことある！: I heard this a long time ago!
values.ガラス玉みたい！汚いから洗いたいな: This glass eye is dirty! I should clean it.
values.はやくあの小鳥を助けなきゃ！: I need to help that little bird!
values.高く上るための道具: A tool for reaching high places.
values.階段なくても上の階に行けるね！: I can make it up even without stairs.
But sis told me not to go.
